item.description:
Out with the old and in with the new! As the new year begins we explore transitions and transformations in our dreams. Change is a natural part of life. It is also a natural part of dreams. Dreams of travel, doorways, stairways, hallways, rooms, spaces, shifting perspective, morphing, shapeshifting, aging, time shifts, sickness, injury, death, changing colors or lights, shifting feelings, wild weather phenomena, and visitations, any of which may indicate we are going through important changes or we may have changes in our future.

Join us as we explore the changes in store for us in 2013. Feel free to share your dreams or not, as you choose. All the best in 2013! Happy New Year!

Payment is $10 and can be made online or in person. Anyone who cannot afford to pay is encouraged to attend anyway and should contact the group organizer Deerheart before attending.

Event will be from 7 pm until 9 pm. Space is limited to 15 people. RSVP requested. Please update your RSVP if you are unable to attend, to allow others to attend. Thank you.

For directions and other information about location please visit the Cambridge Swedenborg Chapel website.
item.how_to_find_us: Side entrance by parking lot, up stairs, down hall, left through angel doorway.
item.name: Ch, Ch, Ch, Ch, Changes
